name: Post Mortem Madness
description:
Post Mortem Madness is a short stealth game developed in 2 weeks by students at Bradley University. Play as a lost ghost wandering an abandoned mall in search of its body. Phase in and out of existence to travel through the environment, but watch out for the mall cops' flashlights!
